talk.author: did:plc:i74fzxomow6w5ndo6vht5sjq
talk.utter: This is why I can't deal with any attempts to season-ize Star Trek (looking at you, Discovery). Give me a weird creature and an actual end to the damn episode.

talk.author: did:plc:ifxcdbf4ofgr4vq5uwf4j47s
talk.utter: this is why strange new worlds is better.

talk.author: did:plc:i74fzxomow6w5ndo6vht5sjq
talk.utter: It's been a breath of fresh air!

talk.author: did:plc:i74fzxomow6w5ndo6vht5sjq
talk.utter: It's been a breath of fresh air!

talk.author: did:plc:ifxcdbf4ofgr4vq5uwf4j47s
talk.utter: extremely. im enjoying the hell out of it. cant wait for more. finally feels like star trek again.

talk.author: did:plc:i74fzxomow6w5ndo6vht5sjq
talk.utter: Exactly! It's so important to the overall feel of ST to have an ensemble cast. It's not Trek if there's a main character.

talk.author: did:plc:i74fzxomow6w5ndo6vht5sjq
talk.utter: Exactly! It's so important to the overall feel of ST to have an ensemble cast. It's not Trek if there's a main character.

talk.author: did:plc:ifxcdbf4ofgr4vq5uwf4j47s
talk.utter: 100% and they have done justice to those ToS characters. which im pleasantly surprised at.

talk.author: did:plc:i74fzxomow6w5ndo6vht5sjq
talk.utter: I am too. I'm glad they've given Uhura more space to develop, and pleasantly surprised by my fave Spock. I was a bit miffed they got a goy to play him, but ultimately I like the actor enough (and how much does he nail the voice??) to be okay with it.

talk.author: did:plc:i74fzxomow6w5ndo6vht5sjq
talk.utter: I am too. I'm glad they've given Uhura more space to develop, and pleasantly surprised by my fave Spock. I was a bit miffed they got a goy to play him, but ultimately I like the actor enough (and how much does he nail the voice??) to be okay with it.

talk.author: did:plc:ifxcdbf4ofgr4vq5uwf4j47s
talk.utter: ethan peck has turned out to be a wonderful choice for spock. nails the emotional range.

talk.author: did:plc:i74fzxomow6w5ndo6vht5sjq
talk.utter: He's really done a great job. It's hard to be compelling when your whole thing is a perpetual poker face, with only hints of what lies beneath, but he does it beautifully.
